Column.Name: Answer
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( AND( OR( $thisValue = "", $thisValue = NULL() ), [Question] <> NULL(), [Mandatory] = TRUE, [DEMO - Skip Mandatory] <> TRUE ), "Response to question required: '" & [Question] & "'" )

Column.Name: Standard Questionnaire RecordID
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( AND( [Type] = NULL, $thisValue = NULL(), ), "Select a questionnaire" )

Column.Name: Multiline Question Fields
Column.DefaultValueFormula:
//Structure is (Lookup field from target -> field to pop on this form) HASH( "Question", "Question", "Question Type", "Question Type", "Answer", "Options", "Score", "Option Scores", "Axis Name", "Scoring Axis", "Answer Type", "Answer Type", "Question GUID", "Question GUID", "Participant Document Upload", "Attachment Enabled",
"Guidance Documents", "Guidance Document Provided", "Confirmed Guidance Document RecordID", "Guidance Document Reference RecordID",
"Question Category", "Question Category", "Unique Reference", "Question Category UUID", "Mandatory", "Mandatory", "Document Upload Mandatory", "Document Upload Mandatory", "Answer - Lower Limit", "Range - Lower Limit", "Answer - Upper Limit", "Range - Upper Limit", "Max Score", "Answer Max Score" ,
"Group Name", "Group Name", "Question Group", "Question Group", "Question Sort ID", "Question Sort ID", "Group Sort ID", "Group Sort ID",
"Question Dependency - Applicable", "Question Dependency - Applicable", "Question Dependency - Question UUID", "Question Dependency - Question UUID", "Question Dependency - Rule", "Question Dependency - Rule", "Question Dependency - Rule Type", "Question Dependency - Rule Type" )

Column.Name: Document Attached to Reference
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( AND($thisValue <> TRUE, [Question] <> NULL(), [Document Upload Mandatory] = TRUE), "Attachment to question required: '" & [Question] & "'" )

Column.Name: Header Questionnaire Fields
Column.DefaultValueFormula: //Structure is (Lookup field from target -> field to pop on this form) HASH( "Scoring Type", "Scoring Type", "Manager Assessment", "Manager Assessment", "Scored", "Scored", "Axis Names", "Axes", "Max Score", "Max Score", "Max Score - Axis 2", "Max Score - Axis 2", "Show Four Quadrant Chart", "Four Quadrant Chart Applicable", "Quadrant Names", "Quadrant Names", "Show Category Results", "Show Category Results", "Summary", "Instructions", "Comments Applicable", "Comments Applicable", "Show Score Feedback", "Show Score Feedback", "Completion - Show Correct Answers", "Completion - Show Correct Answers", "Completion - Allow Review", "Completion - Allow Review", "Completion - Allow Resubmit", "Completion - Allow Resubmit", "Completion - Try Again", "Completion - Try Again", "Completion - Send Receipt", "Completion - Send Receipt", "Completion - Notify Users or Groups", "Completion - Notify Users or Groups", "Recipient Email Addresses", "Recipient Email Addresses", "Supplementary Data Type", "Supplementary Data Type" )

Column.Name: Image Attached to Reference
Maximum Attempts Met
Process Accessible
Column.Formula:
HASH( "Overview", TRUE,
"Assessment", [Assessment Started] = TRUE,
"Results", [Assessment Complete] = TRUE,
"Admin", HASH_GET(HASH_GET([User to Group Mapping], "Mapping"), "Administrators") = TRUE )

Column.Name: Process Data
Column.DefaultValueFormula:
HASH( "Overview", HASH( "Process", "Overview", "Process Display Name", "Overview" ),
"Assessment", HASH( "Process", "Assessment", "Process Display Name", "Questions" ),
"Results", HASH( "Process", "Results", "Process Display Name", "Results" ),
"Admin", HASH( "Process", "Admin", "Process Display Name", "Admin" ) )

Column.Name: Documents Data
User to Group Mapping

Binding.Expression:
LET $data := [Question Change Log]#[Audit - Selected Question]; LET $originalAnswer := ARRAY_FIRST([Question Change Log Array]#[Audit - Selected Question]); RETURN "
" & "
Original response

" & "Answer: " & HTMLENCODE(IF($originalAnswer <> NULL, COALESCE(HASH_GET($originalAnswer, "Old Answer"), ""), [Answer]#[Audit - Selected Question])) & "
" & "Comment: " & HTMLENCODE(IF($originalAnswer <> NULL, COALESCE(HASH_GET($originalAnswer, "Old Comment"), ""), [Comments]#[Audit - Selected Question])) & "
" & "
" & IF( $data <> NULL, "
Changes since original response (oldest to newest)

" & $data, "
No changes since original response
" ) & "
"

LET $columns := ARRAY( "Context Form", "Context RecordID", "Assignee", "Standard Questionnaire Name", "Standard Questionnaire RecordID", "Participant Name", "Participant", "Assessor Name" ); LET $values := ARRAY_SELECT($columns, $(i, col) CURRENT_EACHVALUE($col));
RETURN INDEXES_TO_KEYS($values, $columns)

AND( ARRAY_LENGTH([Axes]) > 1, [Assessment Complete] = TRUE, [Four Quadrant Chart Applicable] = TRUE )
AND( [Category Name] <> NULL(), [Assessment Complete] = TRUE, [Show Category Results] = TRUE )

TextCriterion.Text:
CASE
--check if current user is admin - also used for access via system credential WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' THEN TRUE
--check that the user is in a group or role that should always have access to the questionnaire WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Participant] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Assessor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] THEN TRUE
--check if the context form is not a Contract, & give the following users access in those cases WHEN [Context Form] <> 'Contract' AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' ) THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is an approver on an in progress submission for the parent of this questionnaire WHEN ( STEP TO [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND( ([Context Form] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' AND [To].[Significant Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' AND [To].[Significant Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Context RecordID]) OR ([Context Form] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement' AND [To].[Significant Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement' AND [To].[Significant Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Context RecordID]) OR ([Linked Entity EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Evaluation' AND [To].[Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Evaluation' AND [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Linked Entity RecordID]) ) AND [To].[Status] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Submitted' ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
--check if the context form for this is a Procurement WHEN [Context Form] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement' THEN ( STEP TO [Procurement] ON [Context RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER),[To].[Department]) ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
--check if the context form for this is an Evaluation WHEN [Linked Entity EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Evaluation' THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Evaluation] ON [Linked Entity RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
--check if the context form is a Contract WHEN [Context Form] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [To].[RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Context RecordID] AND [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND ( CASE --check that the user is in a role which always has access to the contract WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] THEN TRUE --check that the contract is not restricted, and the user is in one of these roles in addition WHEN [To].[Restricted] <> TRUE AND ( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' ) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
-- fallback for cases I haven't considered, in which "Everyone" should have access WHEN [Context Form] IS NOT EMPTY AND [Context Form] <> 'Procurement' AND [Context Form] <> 'Contract' AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END

CASE
--check if current user is admin - also used for access via system credential WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' THEN TRUE
--check that the user is in a group or role that should always have access to the questionnaire WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Participant] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Assessor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] THEN TRUE
--check if the context form is not a Contract, & give the following users access in those cases WHEN [Context Form] <> 'Contract' AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' THEN TRUE
--check if the context form for this is a Procurement WHEN [Context Form] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement' THEN ( STEP TO [Procurement] ON [Context RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
--check if the context form for this is an Evaluation WHEN [Linked Entity EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Evaluation' THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Evaluation] ON [Linked Entity RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
--check if the context form is a Contract WHEN [Context Form] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [To].[RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Context RecordID] AND [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND ( CASE --check that the user is in a role which always has access to the contract WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] THEN TRUE --check that the contract is not restricted, and the user is in one of these roles in addition WHEN [To].[Restricted] <> TRUE AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
-- fallback for cases I haven't considered, in which "Everyone" should have access WHEN [Context Form] IS NOT EMPTY AND [Context Form] <> 'Procurement' AND [Context Form] <> 'Contract' AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END

CASE
--check if current user is admins - used for access via system credential WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' THEN TRUE
--check that the user is in a group or role that should always have access to the questionnaire WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Participant] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Assessor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] THEN TRUE
--check if the linked form is not an Evaluation, & give everyone access in those cases WHEN [Linked Entity EFormType] <> 'Evaluation' AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is an approver on an in progress submission for the parent of this questionnaire WHEN ( STEP TO [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND( ([Context Form] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' AND [To].[Significant Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' AND [To].[Significant Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Context RecordID]) OR ([Context Form] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement' AND [To].[Significant Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement' AND [To].[Significant Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Context RecordID]) OR ([Linked Entity EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Evaluation' AND [To].[Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Evaluation' AND [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Linked Entity RecordID]) ) AND [To].[Status] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Submitted' ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
--check if the context form for this is an Evaluation WHEN [Linked Entity EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Evaluation' THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Evaluation] ON [Linked Entity RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
ELSE FALSE END

Settings.LandingViewFormula:
LET $user := HASH_GET([User to Group Mapping], "Current User"); LET $mapping := HASH_GET([User to Group Mapping], "Mapping"); LET $po := IF( [Type] = "Evaluation", DB_LOOKUP( "Username in Role", [Linked Entity EFormType], HASH("RecordID", [Linked Entity RecordID]) ) );
RETURN IF( AND( [Type] = "Evaluation", OR( HASH_GET($mapping, "Administrators") = TRUE, $user = [Participant], $user = [Assessor], $user = $po ) ), $requestedView,
[Type] <> "Evaluation", $requestedView,
"Hidden" )

FieldEntry.Formula:
LET $line := HASH_GET($eventargs, "LineNumber");
RETURN COALESCE([Answer (Bool)]#$line, NULL())

LET $line := HASH_GET($eventargs, "LineNumber");
LET $result := IF( [Answer Type]#$line = "Date", [Answer (Date)]#$line,
[Answer Type]#$line = "Yes / No", [Answer (Bool)]#$line,
[Answer Type]#$line = "Number", [Answer (Number)]#$line,
[Answer Type]#$line = "Image", IF([Image Attached to Reference]#$line = TRUE, "Image attached"),
[Answer]#$line );
RETURN COALESCE($result, "")

LET $line := HASH_GET($eventargs, "LineNumber");
RETURN IF( AND( [Answer Score]#$line = [Answer Max Score]#$line, [Answer Max Score]#$line > 0 ), "Best",
[Answer Score]#$line > 0, "Partial",
[Answer Max Score]#$line > 0, "Incorrect",
NULL )

LET $line := HASH_GET($eventargs, "LineNumber");
RETURN IF( [Answer Max Score]#$line > 0, [Score]#$line / [Answer Max Score]#$line, 0 )

LET $line := HASH_GET($eventargs, "LineNumber");
RETURN [Answer Score Percentage]#$line * 100
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Question], $(i, item) "" )
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Document Upload Unique Reference], $(i, item) NULL() )
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Image Upload Unique Reference], $(i, item) NULL() )
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Answer (Date)], $(i, item) NULL() )
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Answer (Bool)], $(i, item) NULL() )
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Answer (Number)], $(i, item) NULL() )
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Answer], $(i, item) NULL() )
TRUE
NOW()
EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER()
"Complete"
"Results"

LET $completionString := "(" & [Status] & IF( [Date Assessment Complete] <> NULL, " " & DATEFORMAT([Date Assessment Complete], "dd MMMM yyyy") & " at " & DATEFORMAT([Date Assessment Complete], "hh:mm tt") ) & ")";
RETURN IF( [Type] = "Pre-Assessment", [Assessor Name] & " pre-assessment of " & [Evaluated Party] & " " & $completionString,
[Type] = "Evaluation", [Assessor Name] & " evaluation of " & [Evaluated Party] & " " & $completionString,
[Standard Questionnaire Name] & " - " & [Participant Name] & " " & $completionString )

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Populate Scores -- previously was part of a custom task but was added here to reduce task calls

FieldEntry.Formula: IF( [Type] = "Pre-Assessment", IF( ( LET $results := ARRAY_DISTINCT(ARRAY_SELECT(EACH [Answer], $(i, item) $item = "TRUE")); RETURN AND( ARRAY_LENGTH($results) = 1, ARRAY_FIRST($results) = TRUE, ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Question]) = ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Answer])) ), "Conforming", "Non-conforming" ), [Result] )
IF( [Type] = "Pre-Assessment", IF( [Result] = "Conforming", "Response has met all required gateway criteria.", "Response has failed to meet all required gateway criteria." ), [Result Description] )
IFERROR([Axis 1 Score] / [Max Score] * 100, NULL())
IFERROR([Axis 2 Score] / [Max Score - Axis 2] * 100, NULL())
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Category Percentage], $(i, item) $item * 100 )
IFERROR([Total Score] / [Max Score] * 100, NULL())

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Set Result -- previously was part of a custom task but was added here to reduce task calls

EBMS_GET_ROLE_DISPLAYNAME( COALESCE([Assessor], [Assessment Started by]) ) )

IFERROR([Axis 1 Score] / [Max Score] * 100, NULL())

LET $completionString := "(" & [Status] & IF( [Date Assessment Complete] <> NULL, " " & DATEFORMAT([Date Assessment Complete], "dd MMMM yyyy") & " at " & DATEFORMAT([Date Assessment Complete], "hh:mm tt") ) & ")";
RETURN IF( [Type] = "Pre-Assessment", [Assessor Name] & " pre-assessment of " & [Evaluated Party] & " " & $completionString,
[Type] = "Evaluation", [Assessor Name] & " evaluation of " & [Evaluated Party] & " " & $completionString,
[Standard Questionnaire Name] & " - " & [Participant Name] & " " & $completionString )
COALESCE([Assessor], [Assessment Started by])
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Answer Type], $(i, item) $item = "Image" )
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Options], $(i, optionSet) ARRAY_WHERE( $optionSet, $(i, item) $item <> NULL() ) )
ARRAY_SELECT( [Attachment Enabled], $(i, enabled) IF( AND( [Document Upload Unique Reference]#$i = NULL, $enabled = TRUE ), NEWUUID(), [Document Upload Unique Reference]#$i ) )
ARRAY_SELECT( [Image Enabled], $(i, enabled) IF( AND( [Image Upload Unique Reference]#$i = NULL, $enabled = TRUE ), NEWUUID(), [Image Upload Unique Reference]#$i ) )
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Guidance Document Reference RecordID], $(i,item) $item <> NULL )
COALESCE([Participant], [Assessment Started by])

LET $line := HASH_GET($eventargs, "Questionnaire LineNumber");
LET $result := COALESCE(, IF( [Answer Type]#$line = "Date", [Answer (Date)]#$line,
[Answer Type]#$line = "Yes / No", [Answer (Bool)]#$line,
[Answer Type]#$line = "Number", [Answer (Number)]#$line,
[Answer Type]#$line = "Image", IF([Image Attached to Reference]#$line = TRUE, "Image attached"),
COALESCE(HASH_GET($eventargs, "Answer"), [Answer]#$line) ) );
RETURN COALESCE($result, "")

LET $line := HASH_GET($eventargs, "Questionnaire LineNumber");
RETURN IF( AND( [Answer Score]#$line == [Answer Max Score]#$line, [Answer Max Score]#$line > 0 ), "Best",
[Answer Score]#$line > 0, "Partial",
[Answer Max Score]#$line > 0, "Incorrect",
NULL )

LET $line := HASH_GET($eventargs, "Questionnaire LineNumber");
RETURN IF( [Score]#$line == NULL, NULL,
[Answer Max Score]#$line > 0, [Score]#$line / [Answer Max Score]#$line,
0 )

LET $line := HASH_GET($eventargs, "Questionnaire LineNumber");
RETURN IF( [Answer Score Percentage]#$line == NULL, NULL, NUMBERFORMAT([Answer Score Percentage]#$line * 100, "0.##") )
